lead_paragraph: Three students have been charged with sexual assault after an episode in October, and now anonymous callers from distant area codes are unleashing tirades.

headline.print_headline: A Tiny Idaho Town, Shaken to the Core
headline.main: Idaho Town Is Rattled Months After Reports of a Brutal Assault

snippet: Three students have been charged with sexual assault after an episode in October, and now anonymous callers from distant area codes are unleashing tirades.
abstract: Town of Dietrich, Idaho, has been shaken by charges that white football players at town's only school sexually assaulted mentally disabled black teammate in locker room; school has been accused of failing to stem abuse of boy, which took place over period of months; two of accused teammates have been charged as adults with felony sexual assault; boy's adoptive parents Tim and Shelly McDaniel, who are white, have filed suit against school district and say they plan to leave town.
